meanings.sent1: The old, worn-out house looked very unbeautiful.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted the sky in an unbeautiful shade of gray.
meanings.sent3: Despite its unbeautiful appearance, the quirky little cafe had the best coffee in town.
meanings.sent4: The artist's abstract painting was intentionally unbeautiful to challenge traditional beauty standards.
meanings.sent5: The barren desert landscape was stark and unbeautiful, yet strangely captivating.

meanings.definition: Not pleasing to the eye; ugly.
meanings.sent1: The abandoned factory was an unbeautiful sight in the otherwise picturesque countryside.
meanings.sent2: The graffiti-covered wall made the street look unbeautiful and neglected.
meanings.sent3: The cake may have been unbeautiful, but it tasted absolutely delicious.
meanings.sent4: The once vibrant garden now lay in ruins, its flowers wilted and unbeautiful.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds gathered in an unbeautiful mass, threatening rain and thunder.
